description:
A low-profile light that will help keep you seen in low-light. This little light is a nice compliment to your bar-mounted light, or as a “just in case” light for those times you’re out a bit later than expected. The lightweight design is also easy to pop on your pup’s collar for those after dark walks.

  • 2 bright white LEDs make you spottable in the dark and help light your way
  • Silicone strap attaches to backpacks, seat posts, chainstays, forks, keychains or your pet's collar
  • Steady or flashing mode
  • Batteries are user-replaceable
  • O-ring seal makes this light ready for heavy rain – it's water resistant, but not submersible
name: MEC Mica 15 Front Light
